summary: Small training area added to Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
----------------
Description
----------------
I decided to add my own training area to Riverwood as I found annoying that there was no dummies here to train with, as I use a training dummies mod.

I decided to fix this by adding in a few dummies placed in different positions to practice marksman, one and two handed, and destruction magic.

----------------
Location
----------------
When you enter Riverwood coming from Whiterun, turn left and go behind the inn, you will find them there

----------------
Extra
----------------

I recommend using Training Dummies by Orchal, as this mod becomes a bit obsolete without it
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12395

There should not be any problems or conflicts with it, unless you have a mod that alters the entrance to Riverwood from Whiterun
author: Warlord0012
